trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>設計主應用程式可以呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the design host supports the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment"></xref> interface; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果設計主應用程式支援<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment"></xref>的介面; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>設計主應用程式可以呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.ConnectionString*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.SelectCommand*> properties are not empty; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *> 和<> *> 屬性不是空的否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 設計主機中的資料來源組態公用程式將會啟動。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open a database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來開啟資料庫的字串。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionString 屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，並僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: The string used to open a database connection at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 用來開啟資料庫連接，在執行階段的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> instance using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref>執行個體使用指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that supports delete queries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>支援刪除查詢。

trans-unit.source: For this implementation, setting the DeleteQuery property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此實作中，設定 DeleteQuery 屬性有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The DeleteQuery property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: DeleteQuery 屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，並僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"> </xref>查詢。

trans-unit.source: Derives the parameters from the specified SQL command and adds corresponding <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects to the command's parameters collection.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 SQL 命令衍生參數，並將對應<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>命令的參數集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data provider.
trans-unit.target: 資料提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個設計工具相關聯的控制項設計階段是有效的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: A connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object that is identified by the view name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref>檢視名稱識別的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object if found in the data source; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>物件，如果資料來源中找到則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用檢視的清單。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the available views.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，其中包含可用檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of parameters using the specified connection, command text, and command type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用指定的連接、 命令文字和命令類型的參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The text of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令文字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"></xref> indicating the type of command.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"> </xref>指出命令的型別。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that supports insert queries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>支援插入查詢。

trans-unit.source: For this implementation, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個實作中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InsertQuery property in the designer shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: InsertQuery 屬性在設計工具中的遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"> </xref>查詢。

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具用來將屬性加入到，或移除，**屬性**方格，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The properties to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 要篩選的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control uses to connect to an underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定.NET Framework 資料提供者的名稱相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控制項用來連接到基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderName property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: ProviderName 屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，並僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the data provider.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含資料提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理基礎資料來源的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method will be called by the design host only if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 設計主機才會呼叫 RefreshSchema 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要隱藏所有資料來源事件，直到結構描述會重新整理。否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL query in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> for selecting data from the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相關聯的 SQL 查詢<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>從基礎資料庫中選取資料。

trans-unit.source: The SelectCommand property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: SelectCommand 屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，並僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: An SQL query.
trans-unit.target: SQL 查詢。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that supports select queries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>支援選取查詢。

trans-unit.source: For this implementation, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個實作中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.ProviderName%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.ProviderName%2A>屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，僅適用於僅供內部使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"> </xref>查詢。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that supports update queries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>支援更新查詢。

trans-unit.source: For this implementation, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個實作中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner.DeleteQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateQuery property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: UpdateQuery 屬性遮蔽關聯控制項中的相同屬性，並僅供內部使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation"> </xref>查詢。
